response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,500,000 based on its unique features and benefits. As the owner of this product, I aim to ensure that it reaches someone who will appreciate and utilize it to its full potential.

I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a significant discount compared to its market value, providing you with an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a favorable price.

Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you require any additional information about the product. I am confident that you will find the product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
